sentences.en: And HSP 70 - polypeptide compound was isolated from the carcinoma tissues of oesophagus; Results The variety of proteins.
sentences.cn: 目的 分析人 消化道癌组织蛋白表达谱的差异并分离纯化食管癌组织中HSP70 - 多肽复合物.

sentences.en: At the posterior end of the oesophagus is the crop.
Carcinoma of the oesophagus usually extends by local invasion and lymphatic spread.
sentences.cn: 食管癌通常通过局部浸透和淋巴扩散而扩展.

sentences.en: Purpose: The arteriosclerosis and circuity of thoracic aorta will press the oesophagus and causes dysphagia.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察主动脉硬化迂曲,推移压迫食管引发临床吞咽困难的影像学表现.

sentences.en: Simon sustained 40 % external burns and also burnt his oesophagus and both lungs.
sentences.cn: 车辆起火,他外表40%烧伤,食道及肺部皆灼伤.

sentences.en: So much for the properties of the oesophagus, the windpipe, and the stomach.
sentences.cn: 对食道 、 气管和胃的特性介绍就这样多.

sentences.en: There the incidence of the cancer of the oesophagus was suspected to be pretty high.
sentences.cn: 估计那里的食道癌发病率相当高.

trans.tran_en: the tube which food passes down from your mouth to your stomach
